prod_desc: Blow up the rock pile and discover gold!
prod_long_desc:
Grab your hard hat and head out with the LEGO® City Mining Team to dig for gold! This fun building toy features a rock pile with space for golden nugget elements and breakaway elements, as well as a dumper with tipping bed and space for a minifigure, and a research station. Includes 4 minifigures and a glow-in-the-dark spider figure.
Includes 4 miner minifigures and a spider figure.
Features a dumper with tipping bed and space for a minifigure.
Also includes a research station with space for golden nugget elements and a rock pile with breakaway elements, space for a dynamite stick element and golden nugget elements.
Spider glows in the dark!
Set the dynamite element on the rock pile and push the handle down to break it apart.
Shovel the nuggets into the dumper to haul them back to camp.
Accessory elements include 2 golden nugget elements, 1 dynamite stick element, demolition plunger, mug, shovel and a pickaxe.
This building toy is suitable for ages 5-12.
Dumper measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
Rock pile measures over 1” high, 2” wide and 1” long.
Research station measures over 1” high, 1” wide and under 1” long.
